argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s K ) = ( CCfld |`s K ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_subrgbas | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K = ( Base ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> K = ( Base ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> K = ( Base ` F ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> ( CCfld |`s K ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> F = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` F ) |
| 14 | 1, 13 | #P_isclm | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` F ) ) /\ ( Base ` F ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 10, 12, 14 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> W e. CMod ) |
